section.title: Acknowledgments
section.p: To the contributors that contribute source code to ConExp projects, documentation team that helped to create web site, people, who helped to develop ConExp and influenced its development, and also to all users that use this software and provide feedback about it on ConExp user list.

Prof. Dr. Peter Burmeister (Technical University of Darmstadt, Mathematics Department)
Prof. Dr. Rudolf Wille (Technical University of Darmstadt, Mathematics Department)
